meanings.sent1: I enjoy intermixing different colors to create new shades.
meanings.sent2: The chef is intermixing the ingredients to make a delicious soup.
meanings.sent3: The kids were intermixing the playdough, creating a colorful mess.
meanings.sent4: The DJ skillfully intermixes different songs to keep the party going.
meanings.sent5: The artist's brushstrokes intermix on the canvas, forming a beautiful masterpiece.

meanings.sent1: She is intermixing various spices to enhance the flavor of the dish.
meanings.sent2: The architect is intermixing modern and traditional designs in the building.
meanings.sent3: The students were intermixing their ideas, leading to a creative project.
meanings.sent4: The writer intermixes humor and drama in her novels, captivating readers.
meanings.sent5: The scientist is intermixing chemicals in the lab to observe their reactions.
